
File with the IR codes to control PixMob wristbands. This file has the codes to set different colors codes, based on Daniel Weidman and Drneox Github. This codes has been tested on 08/08/2024. There are some other colors at the links below, but doesn't work on my project with the Elegoo components, so i don't include them. I have renamed different tones of the same color for your facility to identify them.
 
# See: https://github.com/danielweidman/flipper-pixmob-ir-codes
# And: https://github.com/danielweidman/pixmob-ir-reverse-engineering
# And: https://github.com/drneox/pixmob-music-rhythm

* RED COLORS *
uint16_t light_red[21] = {1400, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 2800, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 2800, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t red[21] = {1400, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 2800, 700, 2800, 700, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 2800, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t little_red[26] = {700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 2800, 700};

* GREEN COLORS *
uint16_t green[21] = {1400, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 1400, 2800, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t green_2[21] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 2100, 1400, 2100, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t green_3[23] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t light_green[25] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 2100, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700};
uint16_t mint[24] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700};
uint16_t light_mint[26] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700};
uint16_t pistacchio[21] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700, 2800, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t little_green[22] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700, 2800, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t green_yellow[23] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 2100, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t green_yellow_2[23] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t green_light_yellow[21] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 700, 1400, 1400, 2800, 1400, 2800, 700};

* BLUE COLORS *
uint16_t blue[27] =   {700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 700, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700};
uint16_t cyan[27] ={700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 700, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 700, 2100, 700};
uint16_t little_blue[27] = {700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700};
uint16_t turqoise[25] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 700, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700};

* MAGENTA COLORS *
uint16_t magenta[37] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 2100, 1400, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700};

* YELLOW COLORS *
uint16_t yellow[21] =   {1400, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 2800, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 1400, 2800, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t yellow_2[25] = {700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700};
uint16_t warm_yellow[19] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 2100, 1400, 2100, 700, 2100, 1400, 2100, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t light_yellow[25] = {700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 700, 2100, 700};

* PINK COLORS *
uint16_t pink[22] = {700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 2100, 1400, 2800, 1400, 1400, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700};
uint16_t light_pink[23] = {700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 2800, 1400, 1400, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700};

* ORANGE COLORS *
uint16_t orange[23] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 2100, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t orange_2[20] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 2800, 1400, 1400, 700, 1400, 1400, 2800, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t red_orange[22] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 2800, 1400, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 2100, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t orange_yellow[24] = {700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 2100, 1400, 2800, 700};
uint16_t amber[21] = {1400, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 2800, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700, 2800, 1400, 2800, 700};

* WHITE AND CREAM COLORS *
uint16_t white[23] = {700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 2800, 1400, 1400, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700};
uint16_t cream[25] = {700, 700, 700, 2100, 1400, 700, 700, 2800, 700, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 2800, 1400, 1400, 700, 2100, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 700};
uint16_t ice[23] = {1400, 1400, 700, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 2800, 700, 2100, 700, 700, 700, 1400, 700, 1400, 1400, 2800, 700, 700, 700, 2100, 700};
